results.content: I loved this course. The content and libraries/frameworks used are cutting edge and I'll definitely be using them in my next project. Only reason I don't give this project 5 stars is because during the backend section, you have to copy and paste a lot of code without testing them first. It would've been nice to create the Apollo Server first and use the playground to test the resolvers as we build them. Other than that, I'm glad I bought/finished this course!

results.content: Quite a good course, but goes to long without actually showing the changes that are being made. Only at the end of every section is a moment te actually see what you are developing. It would be better to see realtime the things that you are changing.

results.content: Amazing course! documents each lecture were so helpful to come along with the course.

results.content: I'm not finished with this course, but so far there is no explanation of concepts, or really anything other than a terse narration of the code the instructor is typing.
results.content_html: I'm not finished with this course, but so far there is no explanation of concepts, or really anything other than a terse narration of the code the instructor is typing.

results.content:
Useful course - covers Next.js and Graphql. Two technologies which I've been keen to learn for sometime now.

This course isn't for an absolute beginner to coding or React as the instructor moves quickly and doesn't explain many of the things you're creating. 

This course is for intermediate to advanced developers who don't mind using other resources to fill in the blanks of this course's content.
results.content_html:
Useful course - covers Next.js and Graphql. Two technologies which I've been keen to learn for sometime now.

This course isn't for an absolute beginner to coding or React as the instructor moves quickly and doesn't explain many of the things you're creating.

This course is for intermediate to advanced developers who don't mind using other resources to fill in the blanks of this course's content.

results.content:
In this course you create a great project with advanced features. The teacher is easy to understand and all code is available online, so it's easy to copy & paste.
I would have liked better and more in-depth explanations. I know React.js and have basic knowledge of Next.js and GraphQL. Still, the amount of hoops you have to jump through to configure the project with TypeGoose and TypeGraphql is hard to understand.
The same holds true for the styling sections and the React portion. I know that this is not a CSS/React course, but the instructor rushes through the code. So it's basically just coding along, and you'll have to dissect the code on your own.
A lot of the value comes from the accompanying book which seems to be the original source. The videos don't add a lot of value.
All in all, great value for money, but could use some stronger explanations.

response.content: Thanks for the feedback! As always, I will continue to improve the course content.
response.content_html: Thanks for the feedback! As always, I will continue to improve the course content.

results.content: I love the teaching style of this course, getting to see line-by-line how an application is built is illuminating. Excited to finish this course, well done!
